experience.title: Founder
experience.description: 6Silo is a group of colllective heads coming together to start, build and scale purpose driven brands, driven by its communities and giving back to its communities. Our approach is built across six key pillars.1.Foundational Knowledge2.Powerful communities3.Outlier Mindset4.Vision Grit growth5.Depth of commitment6.Disruptive solutionsCentral to our approach is our common vision and trust on each other to achieve excellence together while making a positive impact on the world by leveraging our network, protocols and platforms. We are also committed to supporting the communities in which we operate by creating enduring relationships that deliver lasting benefits. We do this by partnering and investing in important community initiatives in a variety of ways – by providing both financial and in-kind support.

We are also committed to supporting the communities in which we operate by creating enduring relationships that deliver lasting benefits. We do this by partnering and investing in important community initiatives in a variety of ways – by providing both financial and in-kind support.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: • Founded House of Amos, building the brand from the ground up and successfully scaling it to new heights.• Oversaw a successful exit strategy and transitioned to a Non-executive Director role, guiding the company's strategic direction.• Developed key skills in entrepreneurship, leadership, and strategic decision-making.
experience.description_html: • Founded House of Amos, building the brand from the ground up and successfully scaling it to new heights.• Oversaw a successful exit strategy and transitioned to a Non-executive Director role, guiding the company's strategic direction.• Developed key skills in entrepreneurship, leadership, and strategic decision-making. <!---->

experience.title: Planning & Forecasting Analyst
experience.description: •Planning and managing out of stock levels of the Bunnings store network and Customer Return stock management•Monthly Shrinkage reports and short supplied delivery reports•Handling the national Short Supply Audits, managing the audit teams and determining the Bi-monthly rebates percentages and handling supplier key reports along with supplier queries and month end merchandising business allocation and metrics reports.•Operational planning for the Bi monthly verification

experience.title: Financial Analyst
experience.description: •Daily variance analysis and management information analysis.•Marginal overhead and activity based costing•Forecasting and Budgeting for future claims and re-insurance policies•Monthly claims report and trend analysis.•Head of Single Insurance Platform Project•Certified in Microsoft Projects, PRINCE 2 and MS Visio.
